networkDesc: SDSN Indonesia is a network of universities, non-governmental organizations, research centers and civil society organizations that links Indonesiaâ€™s institutions to the global discussion on universal agenda to increase the collaboration and development of long-term transformational pathways towards the Sustainable Development Goals.
networkVision: Mobilizing SDG implementation through solution initiatives and long-term pathways in Indonesia.
networkVisionSubtitle: Oversees the network development represented by universities, non-governmental organizations, research centers, and civil society organizations to support SDGs 2030 Agenda in Indonesia.

networkObjectives.desc: Collaborate with other sustainable development focused organizations in Indonesia.

networkObjectives.header: Share knowledge and funding opportunities across a global network
networkObjectives.desc: We facilitate knowledge sharing among members towards their activities in implementing SDGs in university or organization. Get access to funding opportunities and collaboration and other resources.

Our network leverages the expertise and reach of our multi-disciplined network of institutions. We also have dedicated youth initiative (SDSN Youth Indonesia), and engage the broader region through SDSN Southeast Asia.

networkImpact: We link Indonesian experts to engage in global discussion on universal agenda - Agenda 2030 and the Sustainable Development Goals.
